alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 18 at 3:19PM EDT until October 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...In Florida, Washington and Jackson Counties. In Georgia, Seminole County. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing
